name: DailyRecycle
0:
”Alexa tell Daily Recycle that I am recycling a sprite bottle”
”Alexa ask Daily Recycle how many items have I recycled”
”Alexa ask Daily Recycle how much energy have I generated”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily recycle
des:
Daily Recycle helps you track your recycling and gives you details about your energy savings. 

All energy conversions use the EPA's rates and formulas. 



HOW TO USE:

Get started by saying "Alexa, tell Daily Recycle that I am recycling a can of soda."

To learn how many items you've recycled, just ask "Alexa, ask Daily Recycle how many items have I recycled."

To learn about the energy you've generated by recycling, just ask "Alexa, ask Daily Recycle how much energy have I generated"

To reset you recycling history, just say "Alexa, tell Daily Recycle to reset my data."



TRACKABLE ITEMS:
- Aluminum can
- Envelope
- Folder
- Glass bottle
- Magazine
- Milk Jugs (gallon and half-gallon)
- Newspaper
- Paper Bag
- Plastic bottle
- Plastic bag
- Sheets of paper
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
